Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Pakistan 
    Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in pamphlet on March 30 by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is the immortal great program of the Workers' Party of Korea in its building and activities, which proudly reviewed the glorious history in which the WPK paved the way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and which clearly indicates the way of building the WPK as the eternal party of the President.

Choe Thae Bok Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Phan Trong Thai, new Vietnamese ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present were an official concerned and staff members of the Vietnamese embassy in Pyongyang.
